abstract: FTI Consulting and Compass Advisers, the business advisory firms, said Monday that they had teamed up to create a new investment banking firm that will focus on global real estate.
snippet: FTI Consulting and Compass Advisers, the business advisory firms, said Monday that they had teamed up to create a new investment banking firm that will focus on global real estate.
lead_paragraph: FTI Consulting and Compass Advisers, the business advisory firms, said on Monday that they have teamed up to create a new investment banking firm that will focus on global real estate.

headline.main: FTI and Compass Advisers Set Up Firm
